title: Bug 15899 - Close all saved does not work all the time
OB: Using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, when I try to close all saved files by selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu, nothing happens.
EB: I expect that all the saved files should be closed because no changes have been made.
SR:
1. Launch the application using build 20020508 with the latest UI code.
2. Create a new file named 'f1.txt'.
3. Open some other files as well, but make sure to save 'f1.txt'.
4. From the file menu, select 'Close All Saved'.
5. Observe that nothing happens.
